item.title: 2018-09-07 Class Notes
item.description: Reminders Focus on reading, exercises – Great work! open-ended questions, not always covered Piazza discussion forum pair coding Overview GitHub Collaboration rmarkdown -> markdown Travis What, why? Debugging R readr separators ggplot2 – Grammar?? dplyr Syntax Naming things Style
